Cory Zimmerman

I'm a junior at Harvard studying computer science, and I also work as a software engineer at Solesca. I'm most interested in library and systems development in Rust and C++.


Check out LinkedIn for résumé stuff and contact info. While most of my work is in private repos, these are the public GitHub projects I'm currently most proud of:

  • CS 61: a cache, shell, heap allocator, and more in C++.
  • MiniML: an interpreter in OCaml.
  • MyWs: a WebSocket library in Rust.
